deleted.description: Include soft-deleted stacks in the stack listing

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: csv, json, table, value, yaml)

hidden.description: Include hidden stacks in the stack listing

long.description: List additional fields in output, this is implied by --all-projects

marker.description: Only return stacks that appear after the given ID

nested.description: Include nested stacks in the stack listing

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

property.description: Filter properties to apply on returned stacks (repeat to filter on multiple properties)

sort.description: Sort output by selected keys and directions (asc or desc) (default: asc). Specify multiple times to sort on multiple properties

tag_mode.description: Method of filtering tags. Must be one of "any", "not", or "not-any". If not specified, multiple tags will be combined with the boolean AND expression

tags.description: List of tags to filter by. Can be combined with --tag-mode to specify how to filter tags
